title: Governors Island National Monument: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       Summer Employment for the 2016 Season Governors Island National Monument hires high school students, college students, and others to help operate the park and offer programs from May to September. Find out details for applying for jobs here. Positions are to be advertised for just two weeks sometime between December and February. Check it out and prepare now!         Please visit our Facebook page for the latest news from Governors Island National Monument. You can also follow on Twitter and check out our Flickr page for information on recent and upcoming happenings on the island.
